content.question: Which of the following scenarios is most related to the Twenty-Sixth Amendment?

choices.label: A primary election is held to determine the candidate who will run as the Republican for the United States Senate.
An interest group purchases a television ad prior to an election.
An eighteen-year-old votes in a presidential election.
A woman votes in a local election.

content.answer: An eighteen-year-old votes in a presidential election.

topic.text: 5.1: Voting Rights and Models of Voting Behavior

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors illustrated in different scenarios in context.
